cms.emailtemplate.EmailTemplatePlainText:
Pages have been submitted for translation. The source text and instructions are enclosed in a ZIP file.
This submission was created with priority {% GetTranslationPriority(Submission.SubmissionPriority) |(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)6d06076a43c9e527aa8fd10d2496a8e51af7741da87d631446e4992ddea4f9c8%} and is due by {% Submission.SubmissionDeadline |(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)17339ce0a01c0779088d98a0ccfe61fec0bbf9de7c5c12191ff11258f4182001%}.
To upload a ZIP archive with the completed translation, go to the following URL {% SubmissionLink %}.
